bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" headtube, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon full monocoque w/ Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings w/ 20mm cone spacer and 20mm of spacers
Specialized Comp-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Tektro cold-forged, dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Tektro cold-forged, dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Forged alloy Hub, sealed bearings, 28 hole, for J bend round spokes
Forged Alloy Hub, Sealed Bearing, 32 hole, for J Bend Round spokes
Specialized All Condition, 700x23c, wire bead, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized All Condition, 700x23c, wire bead, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Body Geometry Riva Road, w/ steel rails
Specialized Comp, FACT carbon, aluminum head, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
